job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtThe ideal candidates favorite words are learning data scale and agility You will leverage your strong collaboration skills and ability to extract valuable insights from highly complex data sets to ask the right questions and find the right answers ltpgtltpgt ltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltulgtltligtAnalyze raw data assessing quality cleansing structuring for downstream processing ltligtltligtDesign accurate and scalable prediction algorithms ltligtltligtCollaborate with engineering team to bring analytical prototypes to production ltligtltligtGenerate actionable insights for business improvementsltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggtltbrgtltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtQualificationsltstronggtltpgtltpgtltulgtltligtBachelors degree or equivalent experience in quantative field Statistics Mathematics Computer Science Engineering etc ltligtltligtAt least 1  2 years of experience in quantitative analytics or data modeling ltligtltligtDeep understanding of predictive modeling machinelearning clustering and classification techniques and algorithms ltligtltligtFluency in a programming language Python CC Java SQL ltligtltligtFamiliarity with Big Data frameworks and visualization tools Cassandra Hadoop Spark Tableaultligtltulgtltpgt
